text.div:
Summary

Defining URLhttp://fhir.ch/ig/ch-core/NamingSystem/zsr
Version4.0.0
NameZSR
Statusactive
Definition

The ZSR number is issued to self-employed, natural or legal persons (organisations) who can and want to work at the expense of health insurance. See Sasis. German: ZSR (Zahlstellenregister), French: RCC (Registre des codes-créanciers), Italian: RCC (Registro dei codici creditori).

PublisherHL7 Switzerland
Copyright

CC0-1.0

Identifiers

TypeValueComment
OID2.16.756.5.30.1.123.100.2.1.1This is the official identifier

German: ZSR (Zahlstellenregister),                       French: RCC (Registre des codes-créanciers),                       Italian: RCC (Registro dei codici creditori).
